silver.name: Assassin Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Assassin. Gain a Kayn.

silver.name: Shrug It Off
silver.desc: Bruisers regenerate 2.5% of their maximum Health each second. Gain a Sejuani.

silver.name: Bruiser Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bruiser. Gain a Shen.

silver.name: Celestial Blessing I
silver.desc: Your units heal for 12% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

silver.name: Cybernetic Implants I
silver.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 100 Health and 8 Attack Damage.

silver.name: Cybernetic Shell I
silver.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 100 Health and 20 Armor.

silver.name: Cybernetic Uplink I
silver.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 100 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

silver.name: Exiles I
silver.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 25% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

silver.name: Stand United I
silver.desc: Your units gain 1 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

silver.name: Electrocharge I
silver.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 50-110 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

silver.name: Featherweights I
silver.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 25% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

silver.name: First Aid Kit
silver.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 25%.

silver.name: Item Grab Bag I
silver.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

silver.name: Luden's Echo I
silver.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 40-130 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

silver.name: Makeshift Armor I
silver.desc: Your units with no items gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

silver.name: Meditation I
silver.desc: Your units without items equipped restore 4 Mana per second.

silver.name: Pandora's Items
silver.desc: Gain a random component. At the start of each round, items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

silver.name: Recombobulator
silver.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions that cost 1 more. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

silver.name: Second Wind I
silver.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 40% of their missing Health.

silver.name: Thrill of the Hunt I
silver.desc: Your units heal 400 Health on kill.

silver.name: Tiny Titans
silver.desc: Your Tactician heals 30 Health, grows larger, and has 130 maximum Health.

silver.name: Built Different I
silver.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 250-400 Health and 40-70% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

silver.name: Double Trouble I
silver.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 22 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

silver.name: Weakspot I
silver.desc: Your units' attacks ignore 20% of the target's Armor and reduce healing received by 50% for 3 seconds.

silver.name: Band of Thieves I
silver.desc: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

silver.name: Lategame Specialist
silver.desc: Gain 45 gold when you reach Level 9.

silver.name: AFK
silver.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

silver.name: Best Friends I
silver.desc: Your units that start combat only adjacent to each other gain 10% Attack Speed and 15 Armor.

silver.name: Axiom Arc I
silver.desc: Your units gain 25 Mana on kill.

silver.name: Preparation I
silver.desc: Units on your bench gain 6 Attack Damage and Ability Damage every round, up to 24.

gold.name: Ascension
gold.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

gold.name: Cutthroat
gold.desc: Assassins Mana-Reave the first unit they attack, increasing their maximum Mana by 50% until they cast. Assassins deal 10% more damage against Mana-Reaved targets. Gain a Qiyana.

gold.name: Assassin Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Assassin Emblem and a Kayn.

gold.name: Smoke Bomb
gold.desc: The first time Assassins drops to 70% health, they briefly enter stealth, becoming untargetable and shedding all negative effects. Any excess damage is reduced by 60%. Gain a Talon.

gold.name: Bruiser Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and a Taric.

gold.name: Calculated Loss
gold.desc: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop refresh.

gold.name: Celestial Blessing II
gold.desc: Your units heal for 20% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 450 Health.

gold.name: Clear Mind
gold.desc: If you have no champions on your bench at the end of a round, gain 3 experience points.

gold.name: Component Grab Bag
gold.desc: Gain 3 random item components.

gold.name: Cybernetic Implants II
gold.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 150 Health and 15 Attack Damage.

gold.name: Cybernetic Shell II
gold.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 150 Health and 30 Armor.

gold.name: Cybernetic Uplink II
gold.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 150 Health and restore 3 Mana per second.

gold.name: Exiles II
gold.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 35% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

gold.name: Stand United II
gold.desc: Your units gain 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

gold.name: Electrocharge II
gold.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 85-145 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

gold.name: Featherweights II
gold.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 35% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

gold.name: Future Sight I
gold.desc: Know who you will fight next. Gain a Zephyr.

gold.name: Hustler
gold.desc: If you have less than 20 gold at the end of a round, gain 2 gold.

gold.name: Jeweled Lotus
gold.desc: Magic and true damage from your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 25% Critical Strike Chance.

gold.name: Luden's Echo II
gold.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 55-160 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

gold.name: Makeshift Armor II
gold.desc: Your units with no items gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

gold.name: Meditation II
gold.desc: Your units without items equipped restore 6 Mana per second.

gold.name: Metabolic Accelerator
gold.desc: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health after a PVP round.

gold.name: Portable Forge
gold.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 3 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

gold.name: Salvage Bin
gold.desc: Gain a random completed item. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

gold.name: Second Wind II
gold.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 60% of their missing Health.

gold.name: Sunfire Board
gold.desc: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 15% of their maximum Health over 15 seconds and reduce healing received by 50%.

gold.name: Phony Frontline
gold.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

gold.name: Three's Company
gold.desc: Gain 3 random 3-cost champions.

gold.name: Thrill of the Hunt II
gold.desc: Your units heal 700 Health on kill.

gold.name: Ancient Archives I
gold.desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits.

gold.name: Trade Sector
gold.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round.

gold.name: Built Different II
gold.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300-600 Health and 50-80% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

gold.name: True Twos
gold.desc: Gain 1 random 2-star Tier 1 champions and 1 random 2-star Tier 2 champion.

gold.name: Double Trouble II
gold.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 33 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

gold.name: Pandora's Bench
gold.desc: Gain 5 gold. At the start of every turn, Champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

gold.name: Jade Heart
gold.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Jade. Gain a Gnar.

gold.name: Shimmerscale Heart
gold.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shimmerscale. Gain a Kayn.

gold.name: Rich Get Richer+
gold.desc: Gain 18 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

gold.name: Urf's Grab Bag I
gold.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 1 random item component.

gold.name: Gadget Expert
gold.desc: Direct Damage items deal 33% more damage as true damage. Gain a Statikk Shiv.

gold.name: Cluttered Mind
gold.desc: If your bench is full at the end of a round, gain 4 experience points.

gold.name: Last Stand
gold.desc: The first time you would die, instead drop to 1 Health. After this effect triggers, your units gain 200 Health, 20 Armor and Magic Resist, and 20% Omnivamp.

gold.name: Better Together
gold.desc: Aura items that buff your team have their effects increased by 33%. Gain a Locket of the Iron Solari.

gold.name: Combat Training I
gold.desc: Your Champions permanently gain 1 Attack Damage every time they kill an enemy unit. Champions start with 8 Attack Damage.

gold.name: Best Friends II
gold.desc: Your units that start combat only adjacent to each other gain 15 Attack Speed and 25 Armor.

gold.name: Axiom Arc II
gold.desc: Your units gain 40 Mana on kill.

gold.name: Intercosmic Gifts
gold.desc: Astral Orbs have a 100% chance to spawn a smaller orb that contains bonus loot. Gain a Nami.

gold.name: Personal Training
gold.desc: At the end of combat, Champions that started combat adjacent to Bruiser permanently gain 40 Health, increased by 20 if they survived. Gain a Shen.

gold.name: Titanic Strength
gold.desc: Bruisers gain 1.5% of their Health as Attack Damage. Gain a Tahm Kench.

gold.name: Cannoneer Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Cannoneer Emblem and a Jinx.

gold.name: Ricochet
gold.desc: Cannoneer's cannon shots bounce once, dealing 33% less damage. Gain a Tristana.

gold.name: Hot Shot
gold.desc: Cannoneer's cannon shots burn their targets, dealing 6% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 2 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn. Gain a Tristana.

gold.name: Cavalier Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Cavalier Emblem and a Sejuani.

gold.name: Devastating Charge
gold.desc: Cavalier's first attack after charging deals 85 magic damage, increased by 1% for each Armor and Magic Resist they have. Gain a Lillia.

gold.name: Dragon Alliance
gold.desc: The Dragon trait remains active regardless of how many Dragons you have. Dragons gain 60 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain a random Tier 4 Dragon.

gold.name: Dragon Horde
gold.desc: The Dragon trait remains active regardless of how many Dragons you have. Dragons gain 30 Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain a random Tier 4 Dragon.

gold.name: Inspire
gold.desc: When the Dragonmancer Hero gets a takedown, champions that share a trait with the Dragonmancer Hero gain 70% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Gain a Ashe.

gold.name: Dragonmancer Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Dragonmancer Emblem and an Ashe.

gold.name: Evoker Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Evoker Emblem and a Lulu.

gold.name: Essence Theft
gold.desc: Evoker's attacks steal 5 Mana from their target. Gain a Lulu.

gold.name: Guardian Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Guardian Emblem and a Braum.

gold.name: Heroic Presence
gold.desc: Guardians taunt all enemies every 2 seconds. Enemies that attack a Guardian's shield take magic damage equal to 7% of the shielded unit's max Health (up to once per second). Gain a Thresh.

gold.name: Guild Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Guild Emblem and a Twitch.

gold.name: Loot Master
gold.desc: Gain a random component every 4 player combat rounds when you have at least Guild (2) active. Gain a Twitch.

gold.name: Gear Upgrades
gold.desc: Guild champions holding an item gain 25 Armor and another 250% of their Guild bonus. Gain a Twitch.

gold.name: Eternal Protection
gold.desc: When one of your Jade champions would die, the nearest Jade Statue protects them, losing 70% of its max Health and transferring 200% of that amount to the champion.. Gain an Ashe.

gold.name: Penitence
gold.desc: Enemies are disarmed for 2.5 seconds the first time they attack a Jade Statue or are damaged by a Jade Statue's explosion. Gain a Gnar.

gold.name: Mage Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Mage Emblem and a Vladimir.

gold.name: Mage Conference
gold.desc: While the Mage trait is active, a random Mage portals onto your bench after combat with a player. Gain a Lillia.

gold.name: Mirage Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Mirage Emblem and a Nunu.

gold.name: Hallucinate
gold.desc: Mirage champions take 90% less damage for the first 6 seconds of combat. Gain a Yone.

gold.name: Ragewing Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Ragewing Emblem and a Kayn.

gold.name: Scorch
gold.desc: Every 5th instance of Ragewing champion's damage deals 20% more damage and is converted to true damage. Gain a Sena.

gold.name: Tantrum
gold.desc: After casting their first Ability, Ragewings restore 100% of their maximum Rage.

gold.name: Revel Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Revel Emblem and a Jinx.

gold.name: Party Favors
gold.desc: Gain 1 gold for every 6 firecrackers launched by Revel champions each combat. Additionally, gain a special prize the first time 100 total firecrackers are launched. Gain a Jinx.

gold.name: Party Time!
gold.desc: After Revels score a takedown, they gain 80% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Gain a Jinx.

gold.name: Scalescorn Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Scalescorn Emblem and a Braum.

gold.name: Beast's Den
gold.desc: Units that start combat next to at least 2 Shapeshifters gain 35% Attack Speed and Move Speed. Shapeshifters always gain this bonus. Gain a Gnar.

gold.name: Reckless Spending
gold.desc: If you purchase both XP and a Shop Refresh during the Planning Phase, Shimmerscale champions and Champions having a Shimmerscale item gain 40% damage for the next combat phase. Gain a Kayn.

gold.name: Swiftshot Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Swiftshot Emblem and a Ashe.

gold.name: Press the Attack
gold.desc: Your Swiftshots' attacks apply a stack on their target for 5 seconds. Every third stack consumes all stacks to deal true damage equal to 4% of the target's maximum Health. Gain a Twitch.

gold.name: Tempest Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Tempest Emblem and a Qiyana.

gold.name: Eye of the Storm
gold.desc: At the start of combat, the unit in the center of the board gains 45 Ability Power, increased to 135 after Tempest lightning strikes. Gain a Qiyana.

gold.name: Warrior Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Warrior Emblem and a Shen.

gold.name: Tiamat
gold.desc: Warrior's additional attacks deal 50% of their damage to enemies in a 1-hex area around their target. Gain a Yone.

gold.name: Whispers Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Whispers Emblem and a Thresh.

gold.name: Preparation II
gold.desc: Units on your bench gain 7 Attack Damage and Ability Damage every round, up to 28.

gold.name: First Aid Kit II
gold.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 35%.

gold.name: Blue Battery
gold.desc: After casting their Ability, your units restore 20 Mana.

gold.name: Rich Get Richer
gold.desc: Gain 10 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

gold.name: Big Friend II
gold.desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 2000 Health take 18% less damage for the rest of combat.

gold.name: TriForce II
gold.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 233 Health, 23 starting Mana, and 23% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Trade Sector+
gold.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round. Gain 8 golds.
